languages.text: "Ваша Светлость опоздали — Лорд-инквизитор уже покинул Футфол вместе со своими людьми. Они отбыли в большой спешке. Впрочем, я, как видите, не спешу возвращаться в свою прежнюю обитель — не хотелось бы быть вышвырнутым оттуда, если почтенный Лорд-инквизитор решит внезапно вернуться".

traits.locale_text: {n}Уголки губ Владайма растягиваются в одной из самых неприятных улыбок, какие вам доводилось видеть.{/n} "Значит, гостей будут ждать сюрпризы. У Футфола весьма специфические традиции гостеприимства, касающиеся незваных гостей, и мы не нарушим их".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is too late. The Lord Inquisitor and his people have already left Footfall. They were in a great hurry. That said, you can see I'm in no rush to return to my old abode. I wouldn't like to be thrown out of it, should the esteemed Lord Inquisitor suddenly decide to come back."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость опоздали — Лорд-инквизитор уже покинул Футфол вместе со своими людьми. Они отбыли в большой спешке. Впрочем, я, как видите, не спешу возвращаться в свою прежнюю обитель — не хотелось бы быть вышвырнутым оттуда, если почтенный Лорд-инквизитор решит внезапно вернуться".

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “您来得太晚了，大人。大审判官大人和他的人已经离开了落脚港，他们走得很匆忙。话虽如此，我并不急于回到我曾经的官邸。万一尊敬的大审判官突然决定回来，我可不想被赶出去。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is too late. The Lord Inquisitor and his people have already left Footfall. They were in a great hurry. That said, you can see I'm in no rush to return to my old abode. I wouldn't like to be thrown out of it, should the esteemed Lord Inquisitor suddenly decide to come back."

traits.locale_text: “您来晚了，大人。审判长大人和他的人已经离开了落脚港，他们走得很匆忙。话虽如此，我并不急于回到我曾经的官邸。万一尊敬的审判长突然决定回来，我可不想被赶出去。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「陛下、遅すぎましたね。ロード・インクィジターとその仲間はもうフットフォールを去りましたよ。かなり急いでいたようです。とはいえ、私が元の住まいに急いで戻ろうとしていないことはおわかりいただけるでしょう。尊敬するロード・インクィジターが突然戻って来ることを決めた場合に、そこから追い出されたくないですからね」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is too late. The Lord Inquisitor and his people have already left Footfall. They were in a great hurry. That said, you can see I'm in no rush to return to my old abode. I wouldn't like to be thrown out of it, should the esteemed Lord Inquisitor suddenly decide to come back."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、遅すぎましたね。ロード・インクィジターとその仲間はもうフットフォールを去りましたよ。かなり急いでいたようです。とはいえ、私が元の住まいに急いで戻ろうとしていないことはおわかりいただけるでしょう。尊敬するロード・インクィジターが突然戻って来ることを決めた場合に、そこから追い出されたくないですからね」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, es demasiado tarde. El Lord Inquisidor y su gente han dejado Paso de forma muy apresurada. Dicho esto, como ve, yo no tengo mucha prisa por volver a mi antigua morada. No me gustaría que me echaran de ella si el estimado Lord Inquisidor decidiera volver de repente».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is too late. The Lord Inquisitor and his people have already left Footfall. They were in a great hurry. That said, you can see I'm in no rush to return to my old abode. I wouldn't like to be thrown out of it, should the esteemed Lord Inquisitor suddenly decide to come back."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, llega tarde. El Lord Inquisidor y su gente han dejado Paso. Tenían mucha prisa por irse. Dicho esto, como ve, yo no tengo mucha prisa por volver a mi antigua morada. No me gustaría que me echaran de ella si el estimado Lord Inquisidor decidiera volver de repente».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft kommt zu spät. Der Großinquisitor und seine Leute haben Footfall bereits verlassen. Sie hatten es sehr eilig. Wie Ihr aber seht, bin ich in keiner Eile, wieder in mein altes Reich zurückzukehren. Ich würde ungern hinausgeworfen werden, sollte der geschätzte Großinquisitor plötzlich entscheiden, wieder zurückzukommen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is too late. The Lord Inquisitor and his people have already left Footfall. They were in a great hurry. That said, you can see I'm in no rush to return to my old abode. I wouldn't like to be thrown out of it, should the esteemed Lord Inquisitor suddenly decide to come back."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft kommt zu spät. Der Großinquisitor und seine Leute haben Footfall bereits verlassen. Sie hatten es sehr eilig. Wie Ihr aber seht, bin ich in keiner Eile, wieder in mein altes Reich zurückzukehren. Ich würde ungern hinausgeworfen werden, sollte der geschätzte Großinquisitor plötzlich entscheiden, wieder zurückzukommen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Il est trop tard, Votre Seigneurie ; le seigneur inquisiteur et ses hommes ont déjà quitté Castel. À la hâte, je dois dire. Cependant, comme vous le voyez, je ne suis nullement pressé de retourner à mon ancienne demeure. Je n'aimerais pas en être chassé si le vénérable seigneur inquisiteur décidait soudain de revenir. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is too late. The Lord Inquisitor and his people have already left Footfall. They were in a great hurry. That said, you can see I'm in no rush to return to my old abode. I wouldn't like to be thrown out of it, should the esteemed Lord Inquisitor suddenly decide to come back."

traits.locale_text: « Il est trop tard, Votre Seigneurie ; le seigneur inquisiteur et ses hommes ont déjà quitté Castel. À la hâte, je dois dire. Cependant, comme vous le voyez, je ne suis nullement pressé de retourner à mon ancienne demeure. Je n'aimerais pas en être chassé si le vénérable seigneur inquisiteur décidait soudain de revenir. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, geciktiniz efendim. Lord Engizisyoncu ve adamları Binliman'dan ayrıldı bile. Epey de acelecilerdi. Fakat görüyorsunuz ki benim böyle bir acelem yok. Eski mekânıma dönmek için pek can atmıyorum. Fakat olur da saygıdeğer Lord Engizisyoncu geri dönerse diye el altında dursun isterim."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship is too late. The Lord Inquisitor and his people have already left Footfall. They were in a great hurry. That said, you can see I'm in no rush to return to my old abode. I wouldn't like to be thrown out of it, should the esteemed Lord Inquisitor suddenly decide to come back."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, geciktiniz efendim. Lord Engizisyoncu ve adamları Binliman'dan ayrıldı bile. Epey de acelecilerdi. Fakat görüyorsunuz ki benim böyle bir acelem yok. Eski mekânıma dönmek için pek can atmıyorum. Ama olur da saygıdeğer Lord Engizisyoncu geri dönerse diye el altında dursun isterim."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
